mapper.select: select * from smart_reporting_information where processing_result="未受理"

select DISTINCT username from sys_user,sys_role,sys_user_role where sys_role.role_code="report_admin" OR sys_role.role_code="CCIDAdmin" and sys_user.id=sys_user_role.user_id and sys_role.id=sys_user_role.role_id
